DOC.brief_title: Post-Market Study Robotic-Arm Assisted Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: Patient require primary total knee surgery Patient willing able comply postoperative followup requirement self evaluation Patient willing sign IRB approve informed consent Patient least 18 year age Patient BMI > 50 Patient skeletally immature Patient active infection suspect infection joint Bone stock inadequate support fixation prosthesis Neuromuscular disorder , muscular atrophy vascular deficiency affect limb rendering procedure unjustified . Patients mental neurological condition may incapable follow instruction . Blood supply limitation Collateral ligament insufficiency . Patients prior HTOs Unis .
